name: Family Brawl
description:
Your family is showing up to a brawl that lasts generations.  You have to show the other families you are tough, and some will join you.  Fight as long as you can!

WASD: Move Camera

Click to set waypoint for your family.

This game was made for Trijam #103.  The total dev time before hitting the build button was almost exactly 3 hours.  This is meant to play like a strategy game.

Source Code:

https://github.com/dgeisert/Trijam103FamilyTreeData
